title: Between A Town And Its Bears, A Star-Crossed Relationship
teaser: Most people in the town of Old Forge, N.Y., want to refrain from feeding black bears. The trouble is, without the bears coming around as often as they do, the town stands to lose a lot of its tourism.
contentencoded:
Most people in the town of Old Forge, N.Y., want to refrain from feeding black bears. The trouble is, without the bears coming around as often as they do, North Country Public Radio's Natasha Haverty reports that the town could stand to lose a lot of its tourism.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
